title: Save 33% on this nifty extending clothes dryer!
content:
Cox & Cox arose from a desire to create a unique collection of homeware products that couldn’t be found elsewhere, with customers encouraged to find their own style and to love every corner of their home. And if your clothes dryer is cumbersome, flimsy and constantly in your way, you need Cox & Cox’s Dove Grey Wooden Dryer. It’s the ideal solution to save space that will fit any home décor, with seven rails, six hooks and a handy shelf, making it the perfect addition to airing cupboards and utility rooms. And you can get this fantastic clothes dryer for just £129, down from £195 with this exclusive deal.

Claim your discount

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

The dimensions, weights and specifications for the Cox & Cox Dove Grey Wooden Dryer are as follows:

  • H 30 x W 90 x D 15cm
  • Weight 9.5kg
  • Max weight on last rail 2kg
  • Max total weight 7kg
  • 2 x fixing hole for hanging
  • Please note, fixings are not included

Claim your discount

We have partnered with Cox & Cox to bring you a range of deals. To see all these offers, click here.

Offer ends 13/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

author: Steve Newell
